name: DK: King of Swing
description:
King K. Rool has stolen the medals to be used in the Jungle Jam
Tournament just as the festivities are ramping up, putting a damper to
everyone's good spirits. With Cranky's blessing and techniques, Donkey
Kong sets off to bring those medals back to their rightful place!

Grab, climb, and swing on pegs as you charge and bash through enemies
that block your way. Collect bananas and Crystal Coconuts in the five
worlds of Adventure mode, or play some puzzling levels in Single-player
Jungle Jam mode. Find those medals, and let the festivities begin!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
